We ve added widgets for the lock screen the database has been updated as usual UX has been improved and bugs related to the new iOS 17 have been resolved. Also issues with iOS 12 and the share extension have been resolved.

Due to your many requests American and British pronunciations were added to the example sentences. Also: The speed of the online text translator has been improved for users with a professional subscription. An Improvement Suggestion button has been added to each word. The PDF output for favorite and history has been improved. The database has been updated.

You can now use the translator offline as well as online. Only available to user s with subscription We ve also improved the search suggestion algorithm updated database and improved UX. We hope these new features and improvements make your experience with our app even better!

We re excited to announce the latest update to our app! Here are the new features and improvements that you can expect: Updated Database: We ve updated our database with the latest words and new example sentences so you can stay up to date with the latest vocabulary. Improved Search Results: Our new search results page is now even more intuitive and user friendly. Simply click on the word of the day within the app to try it out. Word Families: We ve added a new feature that allows you to explore word families related to any given word. This can help you deepen your understanding of the word and its context. Enhanced Descriptions: We ve added useful information to the words to help you understand them better. This includes definitions synonyms antonyms and more. Formal Informal Labels: We ve added a new label to indicate whether a meaning is formal or informal so you can use the right language in the right context. Category Labels: We ve added relevant category labels to the meanings so you can quickly and easily understand the context in which a word is used. UX Improvements: We ve made a number of user experience improvements to the app so it s now easier and more intuitive to use. We hope these new features and improvements make your experience with our app even better!

As requested by users we ve brought the Image translator to Fast Dictionary. Also as usual the database has been updated.

Updating the database is our priority as a result we ve been adding new words and sentences. Check the definition of goblin mode in Fast Dictionary this definition was Oxford Dictionary s word of the year 2022.
We ve added English menu to the app. In addition updated the database and improved the user experience. Also fixed the crash on iOS 12.
We ve added English menu to the app. In addition updated the database and improved the user experience.
Fast Dictionary s editors update the database every month and we bring the new database to you regularly.

The ability to convert numbers to words has been added. Enter any number or decimal number to see both English and Persian numbers in letters. Also the ability to purchase a pro subscription has been implemented. Database and search performance have been improved.
The database has been updated.

The users with subscription can translate any words or sentences in any application such as Safari and Chrome by using Share button and selecting Fastdic Even in iOS 15 by selecting any text from your images . Also: The ability to shake your device to make Fastdic ready for a new word can now be disabled. The microphone hides when scrolling on translations. Database has been updated as always with a new style for Part of Speech and countable uncountable. Various bug fixing and UX improvements

Fast dictionary is 15 years old now. This version brings the Fast Dictionary s word of the day to your home screen via widget. Available in iOS 14 or above We ve also updated the database and fixed some bugs.

We have been working hard to give you the best user experience and as a result the user interface has been massively improved. Also as hugely requested by our users the voice search has been added in this version. The history and favourite words section has been updated to allow you adding folders and categorise your words. In addition we ve brought the exclusive Fast Dictionary s Word of the day to the app and as always the database has been updated to reflect the issues and include new words and definitions. Thanks for supporting and using Fast Dictionary.
